name: tf-lambda-distributed-tracing
description: This repo is a work in progress. The aim is to setup aws lambda distributed tracing, without having to use AWS's X-Ray. Instead using an external system like Grafana to inspect traces.

scripts.build: npm run build:launch && npm run build:mission
scripts.postbuild: cp collector.yaml dist/collector.yaml && cd dist && zip -r lambdas.zip ./*
scripts.types: dtsgen --out src/launch/@types/launch.d.ts src/launch/openapi.json && dtsgen --out src/mission/@types/mission.d.ts src/mission/openapi.json
